thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 40 of 3060
thread.title: george e

author: george e
title: george e
text:
I hired a car end of January to take me and the kids from Munich airport to Austria for our ski holiday this year. Cost wise it was a fraction of the cost of getting a taxi and not much different cost wise than the train and of course no hanging around.
The guys are the desk we very efficient and helpful and the car was in great condition and had all the modcons. Very please and very impressed...I am now looking at skiing again in Italy an hiring a car from Turin is about half the price of getting transfer. Will certainly use again.
